public class Light
extends NodeType

Java class for anonymous complex type.

The following schema fragment specifies the expected content contained within this class. 

 <complexType>
   <complexContent>
     <extension base="{}NodeType">
       <attribute name="attenuationConstant" type="{}Float32" />
       <attribute name="attenuationLinear" type="{}Float32" />
       <attribute name="attenuationQuadratic" type="{}Float32" />
       <attribute name="color" type="{}ColorRGB" />
       <attribute name="mode" type="{}LightType" />
       <attribute name="intensity" type="{}Float32" />
       <attribute name="spotAngle" type="{}Float32" />
       <attribute name="spotExponent" type="{}Float32" />
     </extension>
   </complexContent>
 </complexType>

getColor

public java.util.List<java.lang.Short> getColor()
Gets the value of the color property.

This accessor method returns a reference to the live list, not a snapshot. Therefore any modification you make to the returned list will be present inside the JAXB object. This is why there is not a set method for the color property.

For example, to add a new item, do as follows: 

    getColor().add(newItem);

Objects of the following type(s) are allowed in the list Short
